column4: Hi, im unable to change my westinghouse lcd monitor to any other resolution but 640x480, the default and optimal is 1440x900
doesn't matter which OS i choose, it still only defaults to that small resolution
my monitor isn't being detected anymore
what video card do you use?
have you tried running sudo nvidia-xconfig   and restarting x
what is the output of lspci | grep -i vga
if you install openssh-server you can run it all remotely
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation NV34 [GeForce FX 5200] (rev a1)
and what is the output or: lsb_release -c
in ubuntu i'd try the nvidia-glx-96 driver
if you get any sort of display, the cable is fine
